role_description: An Ansible role that installs and configures Dnsmasq
role_description_full_overview: [Dnsmasq](https://wiki.debian.org/dnsmasq) is free software providing Domain Name System caching, a Dynamic Host Configuration Protocol server, router advertisement and network boot features, intended for small computer networks.
role_description_alt: This repository is the home of an Ansible role that installs and configures Dnsmasq.
